faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services.
faqQ1Title: How do I book a dormitory room?
faqQ1Answer: Navigate to the 'Dormitories' page, select your check-in and check-out dates, choose an available room, and fill out the booking form. You'll then receive instructions for payment via bank transfer and how to submit proof via Telegram.
faqQ2Title: How do I book a hall or meeting section for my company?
faqQ2Answer: First, your company needs to be registered and approved on our platform. Once approved, log in, go to the 'Halls & Sections' page, select your dates and desired facilities, and complete the booking form. Our team will then contact you regarding the agreement and payment.
faqQ3Title: What payment methods are accepted for dormitory bookings?
faqQ3Answer: For dormitory bookings, we currently accept direct bank transfers. After submitting your booking, you'll receive our bank account details. You must then send your payment proof (e.g., receipt screenshot) via our Telegram bot @oroedubot.
faqQ4Title: What are the catering options for facility rentals?
faqQ4Answer: We offer two levels of lunch (Standard and Premium) and two levels of refreshment services (Standard and Premium) for facility bookings. You can select your preferred option during the booking process. Costs are per person, per day.
faqQ5Title: Can I book multiple halls or sections for different dates in one go?
faqQ5Answer: No, if you need to book different facilities for different date ranges, you must make separate booking requests. A single booking request covers all selected items for the *same* chosen start and end date.
faqQ6Title: How do I get the rental agreement for a facility booking?
faqQ6Answer: Once your facility booking is approved by our admin team, the rental agreement will be prepared and made available for download in your Company Dashboard. You'll need to print, sign, and upload the signed copy back through your dashboard.
faqQ7Title: How can I check the status of my dormitory booking?
faqQ7Answer: You can use the 'My Dormitory' link in the website header. Enter the phone number you used for booking to see the status of your active, approved bookings.
